#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int T;
	string s;
	int sum;
	int i,n;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>s;
		n=s.size();
		sum=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			sum+=s[i]-'A';
		cout<<(char)(sum/n+'A')<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
